entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Size regression in Blazor WASM apps #66041
  • DateOnly string interpolation causes OOM crash #66040
  • [API Proposal]: NoGC callback #66039
  • [API Proposal]: Let the application author tell us to be idle. #66037
  • [API Proposal]: Exposing the total paused duration in GC. #66036
  • Unable to Unzip Test Assets -- gzip: stdin: invalid compressed data--format violated #66032
  • Re-examine order / structure of regex optimization passes #66031
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Crash/fail-fast if the ICU data file fails to load or fails to decompress #66030
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] KeyNotFoundException thrown when compiling dotnet/performance microbenchmarks boilerplate #66028
  • Add support for Android Bionic runtime #66027
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] NRE in `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.DebugHotReloadMethodUnchangedUsingSDB` #66024
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests timing out on CI #66023
  • COMHost/ComActivator without separate AssemblyLoadContext #66013
  • R2R Crossgen2 breaks simple try catch statement with generic type #66005
  • System.Text.Json source generation should accept init-only properties with JsonIgnoreCondition.Always #66003
  • dotnet-dump in AKS sidecar using alpine base images results in "ReadProcessMemory" FAILED #66001
  • Getting "Loading profiler failed during CoCreateInstance" error building on Alpine #66000
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #66014
  • Regressions in System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTests #66012
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #66010
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #66009
  • ClientWebsocket delay every +- 4000 bytes #65998
  • Make .NET Framework and .NET Standard facade changes trackable #65997
  • Assertion failed 'genFuncletInfo.fiSpDelta1 >= -240' during 'Generate code' #65996
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'm_fgBBcount == m_compiler->fgBBcount' during 'Profile instrumentation' #65992
    Future
  • Match_Timeout_Repetition_Throws(engine: NonBacktracking) timing out #65991
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: APIs to expose existing runtime EventCounter data #65989
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'markedLastLoop && markedCurrLoop' during 'Generate code' #65988
  • Assertion failed 'found' during 'Profile instrumentation' #65987
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.DiagnosticSourceEventSourceBridgeTests.Stress_WriteConcurrently_DoesntCrash #65984
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse2\\StoreAligned_r\\StoreAligned_r.cmd #65982

Closed

  • Windows service suspension with green leaf #64010
    Future
  • [tests][wasm] System.Text.RegularExpressions PrecompiledRegex_MatchesTest Assert Equal failure #66033
  • [tests][wasm] System.Text.RegularExpressions PrecompiledRegex_SplitTest Assert Equal Failure #66034
  • NullabilityInfoContext reports null/notnull for unspecified generic parameters #63660
    7.0.0
  • Use Fast-Mod algorithm for native EEHashTableBase #65778
    7.0.0
  • ❓ Survey: Repo contribution experience 2022 #64649
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Can DispatchProxy support "Create<TProxy>(Type interfaceType) where TProxy : DispatchProxy"? #65761
  • Inconsistent nullability change in TypeConverter.CanConvertTo resulting in a breaking API change with .NET 6.0 #63186
    7.0.0
  • Unhandled ThreadAbortException during appdomain unload #65980
  • Deadletter.txt for System.Memory.Tests #65882
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #66016
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.DeflateStreamUnitTests.Parallel_ReadWriteMultipleStreamsConcurrently #65538
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 2/25/2022 12:04:02 PM #66015
  • WindowsCryptographicException trying to read certificate from file #38717
    Future
  • ECDsa.ImportSubjectPublicKeyInfo fails for ecPublicKey with algorithm-specific parameters #41458
    Future
  • [WASM] Wasm.Build.Tests run with `EMSDK` - `clang` failing to load `libLLVM-13git.so` #65956
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient SendAsync throwing NullReferenceException #66004
  • Intermittent EF Core/Azure SQL Connection Issues #65975
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger #60625
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.DeflateStreamUnitTests.ReadWrite_Success(mode: SyncSpan, writeSize: 1, startWithFlush: False) #65985
  • Make it possible to build just the shared framework projects or the out-of-band projects #65492
    7.0.0
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #65890
    7.0.0
  • JIT: checked/release asm diff in GitHub_17777 #64793
    7.0.0
  • ILVerify.IResolver with AssemblyName #65573
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.ZLibStreamUnitTests.ReadWrite_Success #65476
    7.0.0
  • DllImportGenerator should error if attribute is applied to an extern #62700
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix NonBacktracking quadratic behavior with deep loops #66038
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix div-by-zero introduced in #65926 #66035
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rename `DllImportGenerator` project to `LibraryImportGenerator` #66029
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Adding Count(ReadOnlySpan<char>) Overloads #66026
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move Array.CreateInstance methods to shared CoreLib #66025
  • Add Android 32 to RID graph #66022
    area-Meta
  • Update branding to 6.0.4 #66021
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 5.0.16 #66020
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Some more clean up for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #66018
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Fix S.T.Regex test failures due to line ending differences #66017
    arch-wasm
  • Simplify RuntimeHelpers.GetSubArray #66011
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Decommit region tails #66008
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [monoapi] Add mono_method_get_unmanaged_callers_only_ftnptr #66007
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Merikhamoyan vector intrinsics operators #66002
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Avoid RegexCode/RegexWriter for all engines other than RegexInterpreter #65986
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • attempt to fix up EnterpriseTests #65981
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • FastMod for EEHashTable (Faster virtual generics) #65926
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update p/invoke source generator errors to use SYSLIB prefix #65983
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [hot_reload] various post-Preview 1 fixes #65973
    area-EnC-mono
  • [mono] Decompress ICU data during iOS/tvOS app startup #64967
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Revert "[mono][jit] Remove support for -O=-float32, i.e. treating r4 values a…" #66006
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Keep Obsolete and EditorBrowsable attributes consistent between ref and src and DefineConst clean-up #65847
    area-Meta, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Repair inconsistent nullability nullability on TypeConverter (#63186) #63874
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix libraries GCStress pipeline #65924
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Native aot trim annotations experiment #65816
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Fix a race condition in adding payloads for helix #65995
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Optimize clear_brick_table. #65837
    area-GC-coreclr
  • add missing GC.SuppressFinalize(this) to FileStream.DisposeAsync #65899
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Make ObjectConverter use ConverterStrategy.Object #65748
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix name of regex unit tests project #65990
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • null-check the redirect context before using. #65910
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add AssemblyName overload for ILVerify.IResolver.Resolve method #65905
    area-ILVerification
  • Fix GC hole with multi-reg local var stores #65916
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move diagnostics for invalid `GeneratedDllImportAttribute` usage to generator instead of analyzer #65915
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Updated

  • EE Suspension on x86 should use RtlRestoreContext when available #65878
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Make sure WinHttpHandler 6.0.1 is released #65523
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [WIP] ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Update the StubManager for better debugger stepping. #65947
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview2][mono][hot reload] Fix sequence point logic for compiler-generated methods in updates #65867
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix ZipArchiveEntry names shown as corrupted on other zip programs #65886
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Improves handling of env prefixes containing __ #65757
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add HostApplicationBuilder #65109
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [tests] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    area-Interop-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove support for nint/nuint/nfloat from mini-native-types.c #65967
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [crossgen2] Promote single byref aot. #65682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix Queryable-to-Enumerable overload mapping logic #65857
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Linq, 6.0.4
  • Remove redundant allocations from JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter calls #65898
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.4
  • [Release/6.0] Backport of Mariner 2.0 and Linux Arm64 packaging work #65979
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.4
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Make DllImportGenerator emit a GeneratedCodeAttribute on our stubs #65868
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Define SystemReflectionMetadataLoadContextVersion property for package references #65614
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Build improvements #64938
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65501
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.4
  • Disable default marshalling for bool #65749
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "on frame evaluation" of functions returning char #65842
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • crossgen2: Add --imagebase option #65567
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Abstractions` #65403
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Do not value number locals on the LHS #65902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix DebuggerDisplay for serializer types #65971
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Improve performance of decrypt one shots #65725
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0][EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65768
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Use generic `Enum` methods when possible. #64850
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Added tests for changing a list size being iterated on (#65608) #65615
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector64/128 "All" and "Any" variants of GT/GE/LT/LE #65889
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Fix issues related to JsonSerializerOptions mutation and caching. #65863
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch (#65625) #65700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix cancellation race condition in PipeStream cancellation callback #65909
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Remove pinning from number formatting in corelib #65962
    area-System.Runtime

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Outstanding tasks tracking issue #1828

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial support for OperIsLocalAddr #1758

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS0234 'Http' does not exist in the namespace 'System.Net' when targeting .NET Fx 4.x with implicit usings #24146
  • dotnet tool install error installing when a private feed is in nuget.config #24140

Closed

  • Hot Reload make Linq Expressions code to fail with cached (static) reflection #23736
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Draft: detect if a particular execution of the SDK is on a CI system or not #24166
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 3.1.418 #24159
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.202 #24157
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.104 #24156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.407 #24155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.213 #24154
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects. #24139
    Area-WebSDK

Updated

  • Pin the compiler version in RSG to an exact version #24130
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Blame switch args should not swallow following arg #23722
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [API proposal] Attribute for passing caller identity implicitly #4984
    Needs More Work
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    Working Set
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Add docs task to the feature template #5852

Updated

  • Leave type parameters untouched by 'nameof(parameter)' feature #5829
  • Update pattern-variables.md #5781
  • Add main attributes proposal #5817
    Proposal

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent warning and error for similar patterns that always fail #59860
  • roslyn.visualstudio.integrationtests.visualbasic.basiclinecommit.commitonsave #59855
  • Call hierarchy nesting is unnecessarily complicated #59853
  • Visual Studio hive preparation can take 15 minutes in roslyn-integration-CI #59851
  • Debugging a Source Generator when added to an xUnit testing project does not work #59850
  • Race condition in parameter hints when inserting argument name #59843
  • Understanding Hot Reload incremental update formats. Specifically, WatchHotReloadService.Update #59840
  • wrong "Remove unnecessary suppression" warning #59837
    Backlog
  • Pressing 'enter' in a single-line raw-string-literal should convert it to multi-line. #59835
  • Remove Unused References not work #59834
  • ArgumentException from EditAndContinue.ActiveStatementTaggerProvider.ProduceTagsAsync #59830
    17.2
  • InvalidOperationException from ActiveStatementTrackingService.TrackingSession.CreateTrackingSpans #59829
    17.2
  • NullReferenceException from EditAndContinue.BreakpointSpans.TryGetBreakpointSpan #59827
    17.2
  • InvalidOperationException from DebuggingSession.GetBaseActiveStatementSpansAsync #59826
    17.2

Closed

  • Unexpected overload resolution using static abstracts in interfaces #59721
  • Compiler should provide a better error message for generic type constraint 'enum' #59495
    17.2
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -1066598274 #59799
  • RemoteInvocationException: This program location is thought to be unreachable. #59636
  • Pattern matching error leads to MSB6006 "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #59804
    17.2
  • [Unity] Telegram.Td.dll - Assets\Example.cs(4,12): error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'Telegram' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) #59557
  • Repo Survey (2022 Edition) #59221
    17.2
  • Default parameters of interface type are silently set to null for string constants #59789
    17.2
  • Xml doc comment munging param names #26292
    Backlog
  • Problem with build on .Net 5 preview 7 on Ubuntu: The operation is not allowed on non-connected sockets. #46245
  • RegexGenerator does not work in Razor files #59780

PullRequests

Created

  • Testing to see what this breaks (3) #59866
    Area-IDE
  • Dev/rigibson/check prototype2 #59865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Testing to see what this breaks (1) #59864
    Area-IDE
  • Testing to see what this breaks (1) #59863
    Area-IDE
  • Check for prototype comments in separate job #59862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplifier experiment #59861
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #59859
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59858
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update PublishData for 17.3 #59857
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Address layering of navigation action in code actions #59856
    Area-IDE
  • Port additional tests to the new integration test harness #59854
    Area-IDE
  • Use ExceptionUtilities.UnexpectedValue instead of Unreachable #59849
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix issues pressing 'enter' in a raw string literal #59848
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow string null constant as pattern for Span<char> #59847
    Area-Compilers
  • Annotate BreakpointSpans and fix NREs #59846
    Area-IDE
  • Notify docs team for new breaking change documentation #59844
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Account for possible cache invalidation on a different thread in assert. #59842
    Area-Compilers
  • Port new rename UI to release/dev17.2 #59841
    Area-IDE
  • Ignore documents from projects that do not support EnC when calculating active statements #59839
    Area-Interactive
  • Async navigation5 #59838
    Area-IDE
  • only include entry points defined in source #59836
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59831
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make navigate-to navigation cancellable. #59828
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add feature to fixup code when user transposes 'record' in a declaration #59652
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Unify our test artifacts directory to upload more stuff on failure #59822
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add OmniSharpCompletionService.GetDescriptionAsync #59782
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Backport "Remove handling of certain BCL binaries from our build" to 17.0 #59588
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary components from devcontainer #59825
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59852
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Port more tests #59783
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Produce a specific error for 'enum' as constraint #59612
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Don't get nullable slot if property sub-pattern has error #59813
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Change navigation helpers to operate in two steps. #59798
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59832
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Disallow converted string as default argument value #59806
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove inaccurate section of doc comment #59821
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Produce specific error for misplaced 'record' keyword #59622
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Records, Next
  • Merge features/rename_ui_rework into main #59779
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adjust checklist for merging new compiler feature #59816
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59596
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59833
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59814
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #59665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update config for snap #59824
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merges/main to release/dev17.2 #59823
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59867
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Allow generate ctor intent to specify accessibility #59730
    Area-IDE
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • Update go-to-def handler to support entirely async go-to-def operation. #59801
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Push the two-step navigation system further through roslyn. #59802
    Area-IDE
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add note about redirection for documenting IDExxxx #59107
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Create attribute default arguments during binding #59750
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Not able to run Asp.net Core 6.0 Web API on IIS 10 Windows Server 2019 #40489
  • BuildInParallel=false needed for arm64 installers #40486
  • Figure out unused CancellationToken in HubConnection.SendHubMessage #40475
    .NET 7 Planning
  • OnConnectedAsync intermittently not called #40465
  • Add possibility to disable full application reload when route is not found in Blazor WASM #40464
    Backlog

Closed

  • Survey: Repo Contribution Experience 2022 #39936
    Discussions
  • DelegationRule should continue to work after receiver process restart #40358
    7.0-preview3
  • Make extensions classes public if the type and fields they 'extend' or access are public #40437
  • Blazor Server router avoid instantiating MainLayout twice #40455
  • Dotnet #40462
  • Automatically download the JDK as part of the build if not present #37396
  • Try out new .NET 6 logging generator #32087
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Update IdentityModel dependency #39612
    7.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Update Selenium versions #40488
    area-infrastructure
  • Ensure error boundary service is registered as part of call to AddBlazorWebView #40487
    area-blazor
  • Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40485
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Running dotnet new mauilib produces a warning 'The post action 84c0da21-51c8-4541-9940-6ca19af04ee6 is not supported' #4994
  • DrawString doesn't work on maccatalyst #4993
  • Entity framework working at Debug but not at Release #4990
  • Hot Reload Broken in VS 2022 17.2.0 Preview 1 #4989
  • Using device styles throws an InvalidOperationException #4987
  • DisplayPromptAsync preselect initialValue in prompt for easy overwriting #4981
  • [Android] Gesture issue in Tab pages #4979

Closed

  • Device.FlowDirection/SetFlowDirection() - move to window #3943
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Build fails when Powershell fails to load libpsl on M1 mac #4972
  • Repo Participation / Contribution Community Survey #4473
  • MeasureText in microsoft.maui.graphics? #4778
  • WinUI AutoSizeInitializesCorrectly test is failing #4399
  • Vertical Text of a Label? #4746
  • The version of “msbuild” is too low to support the functions of visual studio(priview) #4978
  • Android app crashes when using ItemsSource property in Release mode #4650
  • [Bug] Intellisense does not work with the Background property #2775
  • Unable to debug android emulator #3208
  • [Bug] XAML Hot Reload not working on Windows #3369
  • Error running page with images #3469
  • unable to restore the packages in visual studio #4038
  • [Windows] Crash clipping images with different geometries #4045
  • Wrong results searching .NET MAUI project templates #4136
  • Reconcile Essentials API's with MAUI #1965
    6.0.300-preview.14

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't set the text on android if values matches #4992
  • Fix template build to use correct slashes on all platforms #4991
    area/templates 📄
  • Implement TextTransform property in DatePicker #4984
    area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Implement TextTransform property in TimePicker #4983
    area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Remove all usage of Device throughout the repo #4982
    6.0.300-preview.14

Merged

  • [core] use StringComparison.Ordinal everywhere #4988
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Windows FlowDirection #4936
    area/a11y, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Update powershell version #4973
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #4977
  • Fix up tests after Shell runs #4970
  • Add Emscripten back to rollback file #4971

Updated

  • Remove Application.Properties implementation #4976
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Map Controls.Picker.TextTransform #4967
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • [Blazor] Align our Blazor Maui template with the Blazor RTM template #4922
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update WebAuthenticator sample package versions #4945
    area/essentials 🍞

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Access the impact of ConfigureAwait(false) on updates to data-bound notification entities #27533
    7.0.0
  • Allow managing transactions via SQL commands in the update pipeline #27532
  • SqlServer: add custom convention which adds a blank trigger to all tables #27531
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Are extensions handled correctly when pooling? #27529
  • Controlling version number (with a prerelease) when building #27527
  • Use set case-insensitive key comparisons by convention when underlying database is case-insenstive #27526
    Backlog
  • Performance issue when perform filtering using Where query in .NET 6 framework #27525
  • RelationalMethodCallTranslatorProvider and explicit typeMapping #27524

Closed

  • Getting primary keys with just a model, no db context/db context provider #27538
  • Batch delete and insert #27478
  • Exception when querying entities linked by case insensitive string comparison in *composite* foreign keys #27495
  • Survey: GitHub contributor experience for dotnet/efcore #27348
    Discussions
  • Proxies throw for an abstract base record #27491
  • Databinding: Guide users to not bind against DbSet.Local directly #8898
    2.0.0
  • Azure DevOps error message "Package is not compatible with net60" #27528
  • Cascade deletion of related records are dangerous, why is it the default? #27479
  • System.InvalidOperationException #27449
  • Temporal table for InMemory or SQLite #27522

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27540
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27539
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27537
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix automated SQL baseline rewriting #27530

Merged

  • Update branding to 5.0.16 #27535
  • Update branding to 3.1.24 #27534
  • Update branding to 6.0.4 #27536
    tell-mode
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.7 to 8.0.8 #27488
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Humanizer.Core from 2.13.14 to 2.14.1 #27321
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Stop wrapping single changes in transactions where possible #27500
  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 1 #27447
